snippet: A court in the Netherlands ruled that a natural gas company must compensate homeowners for declines property values because of earthquakes linked to gas production.
abstract: Dutch court rules NAM, joint venture by Royal Dutch Shell and Exxon Mobil, will need to compensate homeowners whose property values have declined due to earthquakes associated with extraction of gas from Groningen field, which is largest in Europe.
lead_paragraph: A court in the Netherlands ruled that a natural gas company must compensate homeowners for declines property values because of earthquakes linked to gas production.

headline.main: Dutch Court Finds Gas Venture Liable for Earthquake Claims
headline.print_headline: Dutch Court Finds Gas Venture Liable for Earthquake Claims
